name: PictureRoom
description: There are a number of pictures on the wall, in fact it looks like a Rogue's Gallery - or could this be the GameOn! team ... ?

doors.s: A winding path leading off to the south
doors.d: A tunnel, leading down into the earth
doors.e: An overgrown road, covered in brambles
doors.u: A spiral set of stairs, leading upward into the ceiling
doors.w: A shiny metal door, with a bright red handle
doors.n: A Large doorway to the north
